p: Studies have shown the antibacterial, antifungal, antiviral, and antiparasitic activities of terpenes, terpenoids, and their derivatives against some pathogenic microbial strains [ 41, 42]. Although the precise mechanisms of action of these compounds are not completely understood, some previous investigations have shown that they exhibited antimicrobial effects through the disruption of the cell membrane, inhibition of oxygen consumption, inhibition of virulence factors, etc. [ 41, 42, 43].
